snippet: Democratic Republic of Congo's main opposition coalition said it had named the son of its late leader Etienne Tshisekedi to succeed him on Thursday, but some within the opposition rejected the choice....

headline.main: Questions for: ‘Before Vaquitas Vanish, a Desperate Bid to Save Them’
headline.print_headline: Questions for: ‘Before Vaquitas Vanish, a Desperate Bid to Save Them’

lead_paragraph: Democratic Republic of Congo's main opposition coalition said it had named the son of its late leader Etienne Tshisekedi to succeed him on Thursday, but some within the opposition rejected the choice.
